headline: Battery Storage Boom Faces Its Biggest Test Yet
summary: A fire at Vistra Corp’s 300-MW Moss Landing battery facility has triggered widespread safety concerns, prompting local moratoriums on new large-scale battery energy storage systems (BESS) in several U.S. states.

raw.headline: Battery Storage Boom Faces Its Biggest Test Yet
raw.summary: A fire at Vistra Corp’s 300-MW Moss Landing battery facility has triggered widespread safety concerns, prompting local moratoriums on new large-scale battery energy storage systems (BESS) in several U.S. states.

headline: Data Centers Embracing Nuclear, SMRs For AI Needs
summary: Securing reliable power is a key gating factor in data center development. Select nuclear plants can help meet power needs near term, while SMRs represent a compelling solution long term.

raw.headline: Data Centers Embracing Nuclear, SMRs For AI Needs
raw.summary: Securing reliable power is a key gating factor in data center development. Select nuclear plants can help meet power needs near term, while SMRs represent a compelling solution long term.

headline: Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights: Oklo, Nano Nuclear Energy, Constellation and Microvast
summary: Zacks spotlights Oklo, Nano Nuclear Energy, Constellation and Microvast as AI-linked energy plays poised for powerful growth.

headline: How Recent Developments Are Reshaping the Vistra Investment Story
summary: Vistra’s fair value price target has been nudged higher, climbing from $221.57 to $223.92 in response to incremental improvements in analyst estimates. The company’s projected annual revenue growth has also strengthened, moving from 9.73% to 10.28%, and the discount rate adjustment from 7.70% to 7.71% reflects evolving perceptions of risk or return. With both bullish and bearish signals now shaping analyst sentiment, staying informed will be key as the narrative around Vistra continues to...
